content:
This chunk contains import statements and module references essential for implementing object property UI controls in a 3D application framework. It imports wxWidgets components, mathematical utilities, Panda3D core functionality, and local configuration modules (ObjectGlobals and AnimGlobals). This section provides foundational dependencies for creating and managing object transformation, appearance, and property editing panels in the application's GUI.

"""
UI for object property control
"""
import wx
import os
import math

from wx.lib.embeddedimage import PyEmbeddedImage
from wx.lib.scrolledpanel import ScrolledPanel
from wx.lib.agw.cubecolourdialog import CCD_SHOW_ALPHA, CubeColourDialog
from direct.wxwidgets.WxSlider import WxSlider
from panda3d.core import BitMask32, Filename
from . import ObjectGlobals as OG
from . import AnimGlobals as AG
